casebody.data:
Allscripts Healthcare, LLC
v.
Etransmedia Technology, Inc. 330A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 9, 2017

W. Swain Wood, Attorney at Law, Shannon R. Joseph, Attorney at Law, John T. Kivus, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Christopher Jackson, Attorney at Law, For Allscripts Healthcare, LLC.

Tracie H. Brisson, Attorney at Law, For Etransmedia Technology, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 8th of February 2017 by Plaintiff Reply:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of February 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 16th day of March 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
